title: Tarantino has two versions of ‘Hateful Eight,’ and you’ll probably see the shorter one
text:
Tarantino has two versions of ‘Hateful Eight,’ and you’ll probably see the shorter one 
Published By: BGR.com - Today 
Quentin Tarantino’s new western is launching this holiday season, and the famed director cut two different versions of the movie, one to b... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
